name: 🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️🗡️
description:
Beards, bullets and blood. We've got it all.

 Card-based fantasy bullet-hell made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41.

  • Persistent Bullets, Blood & Blades that let you admire the chaos you have caused.
  • Unlimited waves! See how long you can last against the endless onslaught of goblins.
  • Card-Based Shooter. Heal while standing in blood, teleport, throw grenades and much more.
  • 7 different enemy types.
  • 2 different weapons.
